text: Minister for Disability Services is a position in the government of Western Australia, currently held by Stephen Dawson of the Labor Party. The position was first created in 1991, for the government of Carmen Lawrence, and has existed in every government since then. The minister is responsible for the state government's Disability Services Commission. ==Titles== * 20 August 1991 – present: Minister for Disability Services ==List of ministers== {| class="wikitable" width="60%" |- !
